reviewText: Just like taking private lessons, but can review over and over.
Absolutely, terrific! Great content and easy to follow D&D with step by step instruction.

Excellent video - well worth the price.  Dean and Dawn are world dance champions as well as very experienced teachers.  This is a small price to pay to learn from the masters!  This video will enable you to expand upon the basics that you learned from volume 1 and will have you dancing with more confidence.  Great tips...easily understood even by beginners.
